cmp: 占 (to observe/to divine, to divine, to occupy/to constitute/to make up/to account)
mng: to nip, to grasp with the fingers, to fiddle with, Taiwan pr. [nian2]
to nip, to grasp with fingers, to draw lots

exm.mng: to nip, to grasp with the fingers, to fiddle with, Taiwan pr. [nian2]
to nip, to grasp with fingers, to draw lots
lit. to pick the flowers and trample the grass (idiom), fig. to womanize, to frequent brothels, to sow one's wild oats
a snap of the fingers, a short moment, in a flash, in the twinkling of an eye
stretch a hand and grab it (idiom); easy to do
